projectDescription: Built Spring Boot application to manage hospital data about patients, staff, visits, and medical records within a PostgreSQL database via the Hibernate JPA interface following test-driven development practices
Containerized application with Docker Tomcat image and deployed service using AWS ECS and RDS
Automated integration testing in GitHub Actions CI pipeline using MockMvc and H2 database
Developed Spring Boot application to periodically retrieve finance data from external REST APIs
Stored the data in MySQL using JDBC and displayed it in a dashboard using ThymeLeaf templates
Deployed application to AWS using an EC2 instance and a RDS service
Used Scikit-Learn tools, such as PCA, logistic regression, SVM, XGBoost, and pipelines to construct multiple ML models that predict the potability of water samples based on chemical attributes
Created data visualizations using Seaborn to assess feature importance and model accuracy
Used the TensorFlow Keras library to train a CNN model to detect brain tumors from a CT scan
Plotted training and validation loss over 10 epochs to identify potential overfitting
Final validation accuracy was 97.5% with the F1-score being 0.976
Developed a cardiac monitor prototype capable of collecting ECG and vibroacoustic signals from the heart
Created a GUI application with PyQt that filtered and displayed signal data from the monitoring device
Assessed customer requirements by communicating with project sponsor and offered design proposals
Prototyped robot control interface based on eye movements, which quadriplegic patients could use
Utilized K-Means clustering to determine EOG signal thresholds. which detect multiple types of saccades
Evaluated robustness of signal processing algorithm using a binomial statistical test
Implemented a cryptographically secure TCP protocol to encrypt sensitive data exchanged between a bank server and client as a proof-of-concept
Audited a different protocol from another group and successfully uncovered security flaws using Wireshark and differential cryptanalysis techniques
